title: Strategies for Promoting Health Equity and Inclusivity in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of healthcare systems and professional ethics, experience in educational program development
context.additional_context: The need to strengthen professional competencies amid widening healthcare disparities post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Explain at least three health equity review criteria for each phase of the ADDIE model
Analyze trauma-informed safety program cases to apply inclusive educational design principles
Propose at least two accessibility improvement strategies respecting learner diversity in real educational settings
Design and utilize assessment tools to reduce bias in healthcare settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
